original: Sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Sappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ▁sa ppaccay o ▁dhammo ▁na a ppaccay assa ▁dhammassa ▁ārammaṇapaccay ena ▁paccayo

original: Appaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁a ppaccay o ▁dhammo ▁na a ppaccay assa ▁dhammassa ▁ārammaṇapaccay ena ▁paccayo ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… upanissaye dve …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhataṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁ārammaṇe ▁dve ▁ adhipatiyā ▁dve ▁pe ▁upanissaye ▁dve ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ ▁ saṃkhat aṃ ▁sa ppaccay asadis aṃ
